channel.title: PyTorch on A Trillion Neurons
channel.description: Recent content in PyTorch on A Trillion Neurons

item.title: Sentiment analysis using LSTM
item.description: Sentiment analysis is a technique used to determine whether data has a positive, negative or neutral sentiment. A company might analyse a variety of tweets to find out if its new shoe is well received. Somebody who worked in the car industry once told me, that either positive or negative reviews for a new car are fine. The worst than could happen is that people do not show any interest at all.
